EmailTemplate.subject: We’ve Hand Picked Even More Items!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
FREE Shipping*
Some of the items we've handpicked for you: 1 Point
Timothy's Ground Coffee, Breakfast Blend, 24/Bx 3 Points
Bankers Box FastFold R-Kive White/Black Storage Box, Carton of 12 5 Points
DAC Height-Adjustable Articulating Monitor Arm 5 Points
Logitech Wireless Wave Combo MK550 - keyboard and mouse set - English Don't forget to visit our Bonus Point Centre every month to get the most out of your rewards! Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1 866 391‑8111 <[[]]>
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions]]> or call 1 866 391‑8111 <[[]]> for details.
**Please allow up to 30 days for any bonus points to be added to your account. To check your current Grand Rewards points balance, please sign in to your account.
